card.name: CC - EH_5 (8) - Send email to support on client activated

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen 

Your specs states the following: 
When a client is activated in Client Central for SearchWorks, an email must be sent to all involved parties to advise of successful registration and activation. The referrer is also included in this email. 

Does this mean i send the email once activated in the registration section? And where should i get the referrer email address when the sw registration form only ask for the name?
